content: times 24 r5-r7 single_crochet in all 24 st - 3 rounds 24 cut the yarn first make another one the same way but do not cut the yarn on the second half r8 18 single_crochet on one side 18 single_crochet on the other side 36 r9 single_crochet in all 36 st 36 r10 4 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 30 where we crocheted the two parts together hold together the two halves and crochet them there will be a small hole which we will now sew together with 6 single_crochet we will not count closed these stitches in the next round smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 4 close the circle by pulling through the front loop only r11 single_crochet in all 30 st 30 cheeks x2 crochet hook 4 mm himalaya dolphin baby light pink 80303 crochet in spiral r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r12 3 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 24 slip_stitch and leave a longer tail for sewing r13-r14 single_crochet in all 24 st - 2 rounds 24 place the eyes between rounds 9 and 10 3 sew them onto the heart stitches apart r15 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 18 r16 single_crochet in all 18 st 18 r17 single_crochet decrease x 6 times 12 r18 single_crochet in all 12 st 12 r19 2 single_crochet decrease x 3 times 9 r20 single_crochet decrease x 3 times 6 smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 5 bow embroider the eyebrows and the mouth with black cotton yarn as shown in the photo crochet hook 4 mm himalaya dolphin pink 80324 crochet in spiral r1 chain 2 + 2 double_crochet + chain 2 + slip_stitch to the magic_ring x 2 times pull the yarn tight wrap it a few times around the centre then sew the bow onto the top of the heart arms x2 crochet hook 4 mm himalaya dolphin pink 80324 crochet in spiral do not stuff the arms with polyester filling r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2-r11 single_crochet in all 6 st - 10 rounds 6 leave a longer tail for sewing smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 6 sew the arms and legs onto the heart legs x2 crochet hook 4 mm himalaya dolphin pink 80324 crochet in spiral r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r2 increase x 6 times 12 r3-r4 single_crochet in all 12 st -2 rounds 12 r5 decrease x 6 times 6 stuff the legs with polyester filling till now r6-r15 single_crochet in all 6 st - 10 rounds 6 leave a longer tail for sewing smoozy crochet patterns all rights reserved 7 hold together the two halves and crochet them together with 6 single_crochet we will not count these stitches in the next round small heart crochet hook 2 5 mm catania originals light pink t0048 crochet in spiral stuff with polyester filling as you go r1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 r8 18 single_crochet in one side 18 single_crochet in other side 36 r2 increase x 6
